description:
This performance-oriented boot for up-and-coming classic skiers seeking speed and control on groomed trails. The RC Nocturne Prolink Boots have a soft flex profile that provides excellent feel for the snow. A thermo formed heel pairs with Salomon's time-tested Quicklace system for a secure and comfortable fit.

  • Flex profile is optimized for classic skiing, providing good feel for the snow and ski control
  • Zippered lace cover makes for a warm, low-profile upper
  • Quicklace™ system provides a secure fit with a single pull
  • Internal heel counter adds stability and comfort
  • Nocturne reflective details for enhanced visibility
  • Cozy fleece liner and faux fur keep feet warm and dry
name: Salomon RC Nocturne Prolink Junior Boots - Children
